game.name: Divineblaze : March Tactics
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Divineblaze : March Tactics is a roguelite tactical RPG. Assemble your expedition, battle unique foes, and forge your ultimate squad. Customize tactics with gear and skills to crush nefarious leaders.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Divineblaze : March Tactics is a roguelite tactical RPG. Assemble your expedition, battle unique foes, and forge your ultimate squad. Customize tactics with gear and skills to crush nefarious leaders.
